name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Red Boy and Blue Girl Unblocked

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Red Boy and Blue Girl Unblocked

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Red Boy and Blue Girl is a fun cross-platform puzzle game for two players. Explore exciting levels and solve all the playing tasks flexibly. Have fun!

This is a cute puzzle platformer in which you must lead this duo through several mazes. To solve unique riddles, switch between worlds. With the strength of collaboration, you can overcome any challenge! And more than that, collect all the diamonds that you both can collect. In addition, the game also has an easy mode and a normal mode for players to choose from. Join the game with your friends right now!
